MemoryConfig Class Reference
[Config]

#include <MemoryConfig.hpp>


Static Public Member Functions

static HeapVector::HeapTableEntry * GetHeapBase ()
static BOOLEAN IsInRom (const void *ptr)

Detailed Description

Allows accessing the memory configuration. This configuration file is mandatory for APOXI. The header file may not be changed or extended in any manner, it is only allowed to customize the implementation of the methods. If additional methods are needed for the MMI it is required to create a custom configuration file.

Member Function Documentation

static HeapVector::HeapTableEntry* MemoryConfig::GetHeapBase (   )  [static]
 

Returns the heap base table required for the memory management. It should not be necessary for the MMI to use this method in a direct manner.

static BOOLEAN MemoryConfig::IsInRom (  const void *  ptr  )  [static]
 

Returns TRUE if the data where ptr points to is located inside the ROM.
